aco.settings.LI-SETTING.title: Lingering Injuries
aco.settings.LI-SETTING.hint: If a player character takes a critical hit, drops to 0 hp, or fails a death saving throw by 5 or more, Lingering Injuries will roll for the player.
aco.settings.MD-SETTING.title: Massive Damage
aco.settings.MD-SETTING.hint: If a creature takes more than half its health in 1 hit, Massive Damage will roll for the creature.
aco.settings.TH-SETTING.title: Token HP
aco.settings.TH-SETTING.hint: Randomly rolls HP for unlinked tokens.
aco.settings.UE-SETTING.title: Unconscious Exhaustion
aco.settings.UE-SETTING.hint: When a player's health lowers to 0, they gain a level of exhaustion.
aco.settings.HS-SETTING.title: Healing Surge
aco.settings.HS-SETTING.hint: Changes the behaviour of short rests, restoring a 1/4 of hit die and changes the behaviour of long rests, restoring all hit die.
aco.settings.ER-SETTING.title: Exhaustion Removal
aco.settings.ER-SETTING.hint: When a character finishes a long rest, automatically removes a level of exhaustions (assumes based on the rules that player at `their fill`)
